  mail2 = "momodaqqq@gmail.com",
  mail3 = "bang985211@gmail.com",
  wiki = "https://github.com/momodaqqq/qscxx/wiki";
host =

    : 2 == v
    ? String(J).match(/url\[1\]="(.*)"/)[1]
    : 3 == v
    ? String(J).match(/url\[2\]="(.*)"/)[1]
    : "";
